alert.note: Alert for Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 11:54PM MDT until July 29 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Crook County in northeastern Wyoming... * Until 100 AM MDT. * At 1153 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northeast of Carlile, or 20 miles northwest of Sundance, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sundance, Carlile, Moskee, Devils Tower National Monument, Warren Peak, Inyan Kara Mountain, Devils Tower Junction and Cement Ridge Lookout. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 173 and 195. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
